title: Literature Review: Climate Adaptation Narratives
abstract: This review synthesizes how storytelling and discourse shape climate adaptation practices.

sections.heading: Narratives and Community Adaptation
sections.content_markdown: Narratives situate adaptation as a collective response and shape how communities interpret climate risk.

sections.heading: Storytelling in Planning
sections.content_markdown: Planning processes leverage storytelling to align stakeholders and frame resilience goals.

sections.heading: Gaps and Future Directions
sections.content_markdown: Current studies emphasize narrative framing but leave room for cross-cultural comparative work.

references.citation_text: A. Researcher, B. Scholar (2023). Narratives of Climate Adaptation in Coastal Communities.
C. Author (2022). Storytelling and Resilience Planning.
